description: Polymer web component behavior for multi-selectable elements, defining properties, methods, and behaviors for managing multiple selections in a Polymer-based UI component.

classes.name: Polymer.IronMultiSelectableBehaviorImpl
classes.description: Implementation of multi-selectable behavior for Polymer components, including properties and methods for managing selection state.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects a given value; toggles selection if multi is true, otherwise sets the selected value.

methods.name: multiChanged
methods.description: Observer that updates the multi property in the selection object.

methods.name: _updateSelected
methods.description: Updates the selection display based on current selected values or item.

methods.name: _selectMulti
methods.description: Selects multiple values by updating the selection state.

methods.name: _selectionChange
methods.description: Handles changes in selection, updating selected items accordingly.

methods.name: _toggleSelected
methods.description: Toggles the selection state of a given value.
